per_frame_1=wave_a = 0;
per_frame_2=warp = 0;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=ob_r = .5 + .5*sin(time*1.132);
per_frame_5=ob_g = .5 + .5*sin(time*1.121);
per_frame_6=ob_b = .5 + .5*sin(time*1.187);
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=tic = min(time - tin,.1);
per_frame_9=tin = time;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=ra = 10;
per_frame_12=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);
per_frame_13=mid_avg = tic*(mid_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*mid);
per_frame_14=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=rb = 1;
per_frame_17=vav = tic*(vav*(1/tic - rb) + rb*(bass+treb+mid)*.33333);
per_frame_18=
per_frame_19=ht = ht + tic*treb + tic*mid;
per_frame_20=bt = bt + tic*bass*2;
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=q1 = ht;
per_frame_23=q2 = bt;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=rb = .5*(1/tic);
per_frame_26=bvb = tic*(bass*rb + (1/tic-rb)*bvb);
per_frame_27=bd = bass - bvb;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=vm = vm - tic + swi*3;
per_frame_30=swi = above(bd - vm,0);
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=sw = if(swi,sw*-1,sw) + equal(sw,0);
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=mod = max((vav-1)*2 + 1,0);
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=zoom = 1 + below(mod,1)*pow(1 - mod,4)*.01;
per_frame_38=monitor = sw;
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=q4 = .01*mod*sw;
per_pixel_1=mx = 2;
per_pixel_2=my = 1.5;
per_pixel_3=sz = q4;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=dx = sin((y-.5)*6.24*(mx + sin(q2*.298)) + time)*sz;
per_pixel_6=dy = sin((x-.5)*6.24*(my + sin(q2*.342)) - time)*sz;
per_pixel_7=
per_pixel_8=dx = dx + sin((y-.5)*6.24*(mx*2 + sin(q1*.785)) - time)*sz;
per_pixel_9=dy = dy + sin((x-.5)*6.24*(my*2 + sin(q1*.823)) + time)*sz;
